Html:
Hi I am trying to create bubble chart in php excel, but am not succeeding..

The code is something like this:-

$sheet->fromArray( array( array('', 2010, 2011, 2012), array('Q1',   12,   15, 21), array('Q2',   56,   73, 86), array('Q3',   52,   61, 69), array('Q4',   30,   32, 45), ));

$dataseriesLabels = array(
	new PHPExcel_Chart_DataSeriesValues('String', 'Worksheet!$B$1', null, 1),	// i want the bubble series 	2010
);

$xAxisTickValues = array(
	new PHPExcel_Chart_DataSeriesValues('String', 'Worksheet!B$2:$B$5', null, 4),	//	xaxis values
);

//i dont understand how to give the y axis and the radius as each bubble should have x,y and the radius
Any working example or pointers would be really helpful

me too, I can't create Bubble Chart with phpexcel...
No one ?
